skill_modules.description: While everyone’s typical warm-up varies, it often involves playing lots of notes (like chromatic scales) and using big stretches to get the hands warmed up. Very useful for getting the blood flowing into the fingers.
Focusing on the UP_DOWN motion of the right hand. Playing something easy on the left hand so that you can fully focus on the groove and rhythm of the track.
Working on whatever song you happen to be learning at any point in time. This is a ‘free’ module where you can decide which aspect of that song to work on.
